QuestData.Title: Followers and Leaders
QuestData.Description: The documents detail the arrival of High Priestess Azil to the depths of the Stonecore.$B$BAzil is described as a high-ranking member of the Twilight Council. Additionally, her entourage of over a hundred devout followers is preparing for an unholy ritual of unforeseen darkness.$B$BSounds like an event you need to put a stop to.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay High Priestess Azil and 101 Devout Followers.
QuestData.RewardText: A high priestess, you say? And a member of the Twilight Council?$B$BExcellent work. I hope you find your rewards suitable.
